# Sample Document

This is a **bold** and *italic* paragraph with an underline and a [link](https://example.com).

> A blockquote line.

- Item one
  - Nested item A
  - Nested item B
- Item two

1. First ordered
2. Second ordered

```
const code = "block";
```

right here.
